name: MindState
description:
MindState is a game that explores a series of emotions and feelings in a cycle. You control a mythical creature on a fanciful floating isle, and as you explore this uninhabited space you will trigger emotional changes that affect your character, and hopefully you too.

MindState was a four week project. It was worked on by a team of game designers who each covered their own set of emotions, we outsourced collaborators for the game's audio, animations, and camera programming.

This game is playable with both keyboard or game-pad, and it's recommended to be played with headphones.

Game Design:

  • Adam Compton
  • Joshua Textor
  • Nic Lyness
  • Nicholas Staracek

Sound Design & Audio:

  • Ash Ball
  • Chris Ware

Animation:

  • Macauley Bell-Maier

Graphic Design:

  • Jasmine Wake
